Exec.name: Exec
Exec.description: Business executives and fat-cat defenders ready to risk it all to rise the corporate ladder and realize the New American dream.

Fixer.name: Fixer
Fixer.description: They can get anyone anything, as long as the price is right. Using their charm and skills of trade, they make the deals that keep the economy of the Dark Future flowing.

Lawman.name: Lawman
Lawman.description: Renegade defenders, corporate strike teams, or the last remnants of a government police force, they patrol the streets to enforce some order in an otherwise lawless world.

Media.name: Media
Media.description: Newspeople, influencers, and cultural phenomena, they are ready to expose the truth by any means necessary.

Medtech.name: Medtech
Medtech.description: Backalley doctors and mechanics of cyberware, using their skills to keep fellow edgerunners in good shape and cybered up, often at a price.

Netrunner.name: Netrunner
Netrunner.description: Master hackers who put themselves at risk as they jack into cyberspace to download secrets and infiltrate networks.

Nomad.name: Nomad
Nomad.description: Car people, truckers, transportation afficionados, air-pirates, they are the sole carriers of product across the world, maintaining the transport and supply chains in the time of the Red.

Rockerboy.name: Rockerboy
Rockerboy.description: Rebellious performance artists who use their craft to influence fans/crowds and fight back.

Solo.name: Solo
Solo.description: Experts in combat who use their fighting prowess to dominate in the lawless time of the Red.

Tech.name: Tech
Tech.description: Superior understanding of all-things tech allow them to invent, upgrade, and repair to keep the Dark Future functioning.
